mutants.code:
def max_simultaneous_guests(T, N, arrival_times, departure_times):
    results = []
    for i in range(T):
        n = N[i]
        entry = arrival_times[i]
        exit = departure_times[i]
        entry.sort()
        exit.sort()
        count = 1
        maxi = 0
        i = j = 0
        while i < n and j < n:
            if entry[i] < exit[j]:
                count += 1
                i += 1
            else:
                count -= 1
                j += 1
            maxi = max(maxi, count)
        results.append(maxi)
    return results
